channel.title: Should Mexico be wiped off the map?
channel.description: Before you start saying "z0mg racist maxicens r nicee pepel and make tawcows" just listen. People in America, who commit rape, murder, or any other serious crime are always being hunted down. They somehow manage to find a way to sneak into Mexico, where they can't be arrested. What a piece of crap. They start hoping our boarders, filling our streets with gangs, and make hard working people like us LEARN SPANISH. Those spicks should just stay as landscapers for the rest of their lives. Those damn Mexicans, after all we provide for them, won't allow us to bring criminals to justice!

item.title: Should Mexico be wiped off the map?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:8, topic:252944”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=334129.msg2603539#msg2603539 date=1230401891]
Most muslims in America are smart. They are doctors etc. But the ones that go to Europe are fucking retarded. They steal, do nothing, and expect respect and want to change traditions.

But this thread is a fine example of the American attitude towards the rest of the world: If they cause a problem, annihilate them.
[/quote]

Europe + Muslims = America + Mexicans;[/quote]

Yes, just here in England we get Polish, Russians, Muslims, Pakistanis etc etc.

Wrauld:

Yes we can, we have nukes

So does China, France, India, North Korea, Pakistan, Russia and the UK. Oh, possibly Israel too.

Starting a nuclear war with a country because you have an immigrant problem isn’t a very good idea at all. In fact, the only country I see doing this would be stereotypical USA.

Read full topic
item.source: Should Mexico be wiped off the map?

item.title: Should Mexico be wiped off the map?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Wrauld, post:15, topic:252944”][quote author=the bank link=topic=334129.msg2604160#msg2604160 date=1230435875]

Retarded topic considering it’s america that deserves to be wiped off the map.

Your just saying that because America has the world’s most strongest military…

AND the economy would crash. We buy a lot of imported goods…
[/quote]Nice grammar.

Also, I live in North America and I can clearly say that was the STUPIDEST thing I have ever heard.

Many many many countries have the ability to wipe america off the map with ease, Britain, China, and Russia are all prime examples, we would not win a war against them.

You sir, are a cock-sucking ignorant fool.

Yes we can, we have nukes, and they are smart enough not to go to war with us, no one would win, it would just be a nuclear war…[/quote]Hence you are telling us yourself your country is retarded. More troops = more fail.

Read full topic

item.title: Should Mexico be wiped off the map?
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“MujaheD, post:6, topic:252944”][quote author=the fu superior link=topic=334129.msg2602334#msg2602334 date=1230328209]

Before you start saying “z0mg racist maxicens r nicee pepel and make tawcows” just listen. People in America, who commit rape, murder, or any other serious crime are always being hunted down. They somehow manage to find a way to sneak into Mexico, where they can’t be arrested. What a piece of crap. They start hoping our boarders, filling our streets with gangs, and make hard working people like us LEARN SPANISH. Those spicks should just stay as landscapers for the rest of their lives. Those damn Mexicans, after all we provide for them, won’t allow us to bring criminals to justice!

Ummm, most of the idiots thinking they can jump the border and not get arrested are retarded, because most of them cross illegally no matter which way they come from they are still gonna get arrested for that.

And you are being racist, I’m pretty sure that you are not 100% American, as most of the people on here aren’t, because they are not related to American indians, most of them are idiots who think they are American because they live in America, If you live here legally, You’re an American citizen, not an American.

What that means is that your family immigrated from some place like the “spicks” do. There is alot of Mexican gangs, But not everyone, Give me the name of a single Native American gang and then I’ll support your argument, There are gangs from all different cultures.

Why don’t you look in the mirror and read some books about Mexico and America. Mexicans immigrate to America because they aren’t many jobs, and they live in harsh conditions. You should be lucky that you live in America rather then in the conditons that they do

Muslims don’t make gangs in America. We make gangs outside of America and bomb places. Also, no one has to change their way of life because we live in America. (not unless they’re paranoid). We didn’t come in such numbers to force people to learn our language. No one goes to the middle east when they commit a crime, if they do, then they will most likely be shot, in whatever country regardless of what he/she has done.
[/quote]

The bold part is wrong. I highly doubt that you’d get convicted for a crime you’ve committed overseas, either way, you don’t get shot.[/quote]
No, I mean. As soon as a muslim sees an American, they hate them. So chances are they will be shot.

Read full topic
